afterTrial.question: What happens after the free trial?
afterTrial.answer: After your 2-month free trial, you'll be automatically charged €9.99/month. You can cancel anytime before the trial ends with no charge.

cancel.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancel.answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription anytime through your account settings. You'll continue to have Premium access until the end of your current billing period.

stillFree.question: Are rides still free with Premium?
stillFree.answer: Absolutely! All rides remain free for everyone. Premium just gives you additional features to enhance your travel experience.
